column1: 16:17|Apparently the great Percy has no sense of humour
column2: for at four-seventeen he got tired of it
column3: and hit Skinner crisply in the right eyeball
column4: blacking the same as per illustration.|A Prefect's Uncle|P.G. Wodehouse

column1: 16:17|In the next instant she was running toward her house
column2: unmindful of the bags she had dropped
column4: knowing as she glanced down at her watch and saw that it was seventeen minutes after four
column5: that for her time had stopped.|Life Penalty|Joy Fielding
